formalpara.title: Figure 4. Nomarski time-lapse images of C. elegans gastrulation
formalpara.para: Ea and Ep are pseudocolored in green, and neighboring cells are in blue. Arrows indicate direction of neighboring cell movement. The left panel shows a lateral view, with the P4 and MSxx labeled (MSx is in the first image, and MSx divides between the first and second images). The right panel shows a ventral view, with Ea and Ep sinking into the embryo. Embryos are oriented anterior to the left.
